title: Crash causing delays on motorway
text:
Crash causing delays on M3 motorway Crash causing delays on motorway 
A MULTI-VEHICLE crash is causing delays on a Hampshire motorway. 
The M3 is gridlocked in both directions between junction 5 at Hook and 4A at Cove. 
The incident occured just before 5pm and is said to involve four vehicles, with police, ambulance and fire serices are on the scene. 
A witness said the people involved were being cut free from their cars. Share article 
Lanes one and two of the soutbound carriageway were reopened shortly after 5.30pm.
